post.title: 8ch lpcm is here!!!
post.content: http://www.anandtech.com/tradeshows/showdoc.aspx?i=3324 asus has come through with a 8ch 24bit/192hz hdmi soundcard!! article states that asus will bundle a customized version of arcsoft totalmedia theater for playback duties. it supports dts-ma and dolby truhd
